# SpeakMate - AI English Fluency Coach

## Project Overview
SpeakMate is an AI-powered English fluency companion app that helps users improve their English through natural conversation.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 (App Router)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Package Manager**: npm
- **Node**: v24.11.1 (via NVM)

## Features
- Interactive chat interface for English practice
- Real-time conversational feedback
- Modern responsive UI with dark mode
- API route for AI integration (ready for OpenAI/Anthropic)

## Development
- Run dev server: `npm run dev`
- Build: `npm run build`
- Lint: `npm run lint`

## Project Structure
- `src/app/` - Next.js App Router pages and layouts
- `src/app/api/chat/` - Chat API endpoint
- `.github/` - GitHub and Copilot configurations

## Next Steps
1. Add OpenAI API integration for real AI responses
2. Implement voice features (speech-to-text/text-to-speech)
3. Add progress tracking and user analytics
4. Enhance grammar correction and feedback

Work through each checklist item systematically.
Keep communication concise and focused.
Follow development best practices.
